system.availability: [Addictive] Grants +10 to Toughness Tests for one hour, can also help deaden pain or cleanse a wound. After Imbibing, make a Toughness Test (varies with craftsmanship), failiure gives -10 to Agility, Perception, Intelligence, and Willpower for one hour, +1 per DoF. Poor: +0 Test, Common: +10 Test, Good: +20 Test, Best: +30 Test.
system.cost: Availability Varies with Craftsmanship: Poor: Common, Common: Average, Good/Best: Scarce
